title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - February 8, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - February 8, 2022
description:
Adam and Mark get together in studio to discuss the changes coming to California's mask mandates, new messaging out of CNN and some curious statements from Republicans regarding January 6th

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
